Course Description: APPLICATIONS OF DATA ANALYTICS IN AUDITING, MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING AND FINANCIAL STATEMENT ANALYSIS
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major: STUDENTS WILL DEVELOP AN UNDERSTANDING OF THE USE OF DATA ANALYTICS IN THE ACCOUNTING PROFESSION AND GAIN HANDS-ON SKILLS IN APPLYING DATA ANALYTICS TO ACCOUNTING USE CASES.
Textbook(s): DATA ANALYTICS FOR ACCOUNTING, 2ND  EDITION, RICHARDSON VERNON, TEETER, RYAN A., AND TERRELL, KATIE L.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
